scripts.lib: git submodule update --recursive --remote && echo '✅  libraries updated'
scripts.abi: rm -rf abis && yarn lib && cd lib/protocol && sh scripts/abi.sh && mv abi ../../abis && cd ../.. && echo '✅  ABIs updated'
scripts.gen: graph codegen && echo '✅  typescript files build from schema'
scripts.build: graph build && echo '✅  WASM files built from source'
scripts.run-postgres: brew services start postgres && echo '✅  postgres started'
scripts.build-graph-node: cd lib/graph-node && cargo build && cd ../.. && echo '✅  graph-node built and ready, run with: yarn run-graph-node'
scripts.run-graph-node: cd lib/graph-node && source ../../.env && cargo run -p graph-node --release -- --postgres-url postgresql://$USERNAME:@localhost:5432/graph-node --ethereum-rpc rinkeby::https://eth-rinkeby.alchemyapi.io/v2/$ALCHEMY_API_KEY --ipfs 127.0.0.1:5001
scripts.create-local: graph create --node http://localhost:8020/ 0xStation/Station && echo '✅  subgraph created'
scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001/ 0xStation/Station && echo '✅  subgraph deployed'
scripts.auth: graph auth --product hosted-service $ACCESS_TOKEN && echo '✅  account authenticated'
scripts.deploy-rinkeby: graph deploy --product hosted-service 0xStation/Station && echo '✅  subgraph deployed to rinkeby'
